scripts.dev: concurrently "cd main; pnpm dev " "cd mfe1; pnpm dev" "cd mfe2; pnpm dev "
scripts.build: concurrently "cd main; pnpm build " "cd mfe1; pnpm build" "cd mfe2; pnpm build "
scripts.serve: concurrently "cd main; pnpm start " "cd mfe1; pnpm start" "cd mfe2; pnpm start "
scripts.postinstall: concurrently "cd main; pnpm" "cd mfe1; pnpm" "cd mfe2; pnpm"
scripts.install: concurrently "cd main; pnpm install" "cd mfe1; pnpm install" "cd mfe2; pnpm install"
scripts.clean: concurrently "cd main && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json" "cd mfe1 && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json" "cd mfe2 && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json"
